channel.title: Halo Master Chief Collection (4,3,2,1 remake)
channel.description:
Anyone else keen for the halo 4/3/2/1 etc remake for xbox one? My god.... this will be like the epitome of me rekindling my youth
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halo:_The_Master_Chief_Collection
inb4 halo is a bad game inb4 play pc noob console gamer bla bla inb4 f[b][/b]uck you halo is gr8

item.title: Halo Master Chief Collection (4,3,2,1 remake)
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

I believe they did a wonderful job on the campaign. Updating graphics (For the H2A) came out what I felt was spectacular.

I am very disappointed though with the Matchmaking system and how screwed up it is. I know unexpected things happen, But the Matchmaking screwed up this bad is really inexcusable. I still love the game now and can’t wait for them to have Matchmaking up and running 100%

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Master Chief Collection (4,3,2,1 remake)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Elrick:

I have bought a paintball gun that I never used and a guitar I never played when I was younger. Even after hours of playing Xbox One, I still regret the Xbox One the most. It has poor performance, the home screen is shite compared to the xbox 360, and it has nothing special over a PS4 or computer besides Halo, which is an overrated title… I bought the xBrick One last November, and I just bought a gaming PC rig because it is that bad.

That is your opinion, not everyone else’s. There are other exclusives besides Halo, Forza is another popular one. Just like Playstation has Killzone and Gran Turismo. The home screen follows the same design cues as the 360, and you know what is a great feature the 360 didn’t have? You can go there at any time without the game shutting down. And a feature the PS4 doesn’t have? Instantaneous suspend/resume of the game after powering down the console.

I can argue points for either console, that doesn’t make one better than the other. Everyone is different, and they buy what works best for them. Most of my friends have an Xbox, so that’s where I spend my time. That doesn’t mean I own a gaming PC because my Xbox sucks, I just want a different gaming experience.

I’m sorry you aren’t happy with your purchase. You should do more research before making a big purchase like that.

Read full topic
